product_overview: This platform provides integrated solutions for worklog management, shift scheduling, user authentication, community board interactions with AI-powered summaries, and live broadcast status monitoring. It supports seamless session handling, complex UI workflows for worklogs and shifts, and efficient communication features for users in an enterprise environment.
core_goals: Ensure robust authentication and session management with PIN security and smooth login/logout flows.
Facilitate comprehensive worklog and shift pattern management with dynamic data synchronization and UI responsiveness.
Enable rich community interactions through posts, comments, AI-generated summaries, and media management.
Provide real-time broadcast status monitoring with clear visual layouts and responsive design.
Maintain high usability with global UI/UX consistency including dark mode support and mobile responsiveness.
key_features: Authentication system with session persistence, Google login integration, and PIN verification.
Worklog creation, editing, tabbed navigation, and automatic/manual data saving.
Shift pattern configuration wizard with multi-step data input and worker assignment functionalities.
Community board with post creation/editing, image upload, emoji supported comments, and AI-generated summaries.
Broadcasts list and detailed monitoring view with color-coded schedule filtering and full-screen layout support.
Global UI enhancements including dark mode toggle, responsive sidebar, and error message toasts.
user_flow_summary: User logs in with credentials or Google OAuth, with session persistence and PIN verification where configured.
User manages daily worklogs using tabbed interface, with auto-save and seamless data syncing.
Supervisor configures shift patterns using a step-by-step wizard and assigns workers accordingly.
User browses and interacts with community posts: writes posts with rich editor, adds images, comments with emojis, and views AI-generated summaries.
User monitors live broadcasts and their schedules via dedicated dashboard pages with responsive layouts across device types.
validation_criteria: Session is maintained on page refresh without logout or redirect loops.
PIN authentication triggers correctly during login and validates user inputs.
Worklog tabs open and switch without data loss and URL updates accurately.
Shift wizard maintains data integrity across steps and lists unassigned workers correctly.
Post editor supports image resizing and uploads without errors; AI summaries display reliably.
Comments show emoji picker and apply emojis correctly with optimistic UI updates.
Broadcast monitor layout remains responsive and functional in full-screen mode.
Global UI features like dark mode toggle and mobile sidebar operate without flicker or errors.
API failures show user-friendly toasts and do not break the user experience.
